# [Interview #249: KOD Signing Report - Bluecole, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=249#7)

#### Robert Jordan

You CANNOT reach the Tower of Ghengei through the Portal Stones. (direct from RJ)
